item.description:
In conjunction with the North Boston Law of Attraction, we present:

  • Forgiveness & Gratitude are such a vital part of emotional well-being. It is a means of clearing yourself of thoughts and feelings that get in the way of attracting what you want - Law of Attraction.

  • Ho'Oponopono (Hawaiian process of forgiveness and clearing)

    The Hawaiian translation - "To make things right." Pono actually means "Right," so you might say to make things doubly right, or  make things right with yourself and the world.

    Kevin Martin will be hosting a hypnotic experience of clearing and releasing anything  that has to do with relationships between others and yourself that may have a negative impact on you.

  • Ho'Oponopono will move you from a place of anger and or resentment to Forgiveness & Gratitude.
  • Come and be ready to RELAX and RELEASE!

    On this evening we will -

    • Discover what Ho'oponopono is and what it really means
    • Learn some basics of Huna
    • Learn a bit about the history of ho'oponopono
      • Morna Simeone
      • Dr. Hew Len
    • Experience a beautiful forgiveness meditation
    Kevin Martin is a certified hypnotherapist and master practitioner of NLP (Neuro-Linguistic Programming). He is also a personal development author (Perceive This!), professional speaker and trainer. Kevin has been studying personal development of many forms for over 30 years. He has been a hypnotherapist for 9 years. Kevin’s website is www.poseffects.com

    Please join us for this wonderful evening.

Please call if you are joining us for the first time

We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
See you there! 

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Healing and Clearing through Ho'Oponopono
